name: Etsy Sidebar Widget
author: Troy Schulz

sections.description:
Adds WordPress sidebar widget to display your Etsy Mini on the website and offer visitors a chance to view what you are selling on your Etsy page. You can display what your selling or what’s in your Etsy Favorites.

See also:

  • Etsy Mini (You will need to login to your Etsy account) http://www.etsy.com/mini_generator.php
  • Manual Instructions for adding a Mini Etsy to your website. http://fix.etsy.com/?p=187
sections.installation:
1. Upload wp-etsy-widget.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Use WordPress ‘Widgets’ menu to add new widget onto the website

short_description: Display your Etsy Mini and offer visitors a chance to view what you are selling on your Etsy page. Either what your selling or from your Favorites!
